spec_data.Name: adobe-source-sans-pro-fonts
spec_data.Description:
Source Sans is a set of OpenType fonts that have been designed to work well in
user interface (UI) environments, as well as in text setting for screen and
print.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 17 Oct 2017 04:16:49 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A set of OpenType fonts designed for user interfaces
